attributes.action: scrap the hinkey nuclear power plant and invest in renewable energy
attributes.additional_details: renewable energy is the only way forward and we need to take action now
attributes.background: The UK government has just gave the green light for the £16bn nuclear power plant to be built in Britain, owned by China and France! Fukishima plant in Japan has now contaminated one third of the worlds oceans and is evidence of how unstable and dangerous this energy is.
